did.unittitle: Harriet Mulford Lothropto Alice M. Pierce

scopecontent.p: [Inexact quotation from Mrs. Pepper in Five Little Peppers and How They Grew, signed with her pseudonym " Margaret Sidney" as well as her own name.]

did.unittitle: Harriet Mulford Lothropto Miss Charlotte Fiske Bates(Mme. Adolphe Roge)

scopecontent.p: [Regrets that Miss Bates cannot be among the readers for the benefit of the Beneficent Society of the Conservatory of Musicon November 8; mentions lack of funds to pay the readers; wishes her well in her new location in New Yorkbut regrets her leaving Cambridge; mentions traveling during the winter months; hopes to visit her in New Yorksometime; writes from The Wayside. ]
